Apple___Apple_scab.description: A fungal disease that causes dark, scabby lesions on leaves, fruit, and stems.
Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Olive-green to brown velvety spots on leaves, deformed fruit with scabby lesions
Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Apply fungicides (captan, sulfur) at bud break. Remove and destroy infected plant parts.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead watering.

Apple___Black_rot.description: A fungal disease causing fruit rot, leaf spots, and cankers.
Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Brown circular spots on fruit, frog-eye leaf spots, dead branches
Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Remove infected plant parts, apply copper fungicides.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Remove mummified fruit, prune dead wood, plant resistant varieties.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.description: A fungal disease requiring juniper as an alternate host.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Orange-yellow spots on leaves, galls on cedar trees
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Remove nearby juniper hosts, plant resistant varieties.

Apple___healthy.description: The apple plant is healthy with no visible disease symptoms.
Apple___healthy.prevention: Maintain proper nutrition, watering, and pest management.

Blueberry___healthy.prevention: Maintain acidic soil pH (4.5-5.5), adequate watering.

Cherry___Powdery_mildew.description: A fungal disease covering leaves with white powdery coating.
Cherry___Powdery_mildew.symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves, stunted growth, distorted fruit
Cherry___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, improve air circulation.
Cherry___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid excess nitrogen.

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot.description: A fungal disease causing rectangular lesions on corn leaves.
Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot.symptoms: Tan to gray rectangular lesions between veins
Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids, crop rotation, tillage.

Corn___Common_rust_.description: A fungal disease causing rust-colored pustules on leaves.
Corn___Common_rust_.symptoms: Small, circular, reddish-brown pustules on both leaf surfaces
Corn___Common_rust_.treatment: Apply fungicides if severe, plant resistant varieties.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: A fungal disease causing large, elliptical gray-green lesions.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.symptoms: Large elliptical gray-green lesions, premature death

Grape___Black_rot.description: A fungal disease causing brown spots and fruit rot.
Grape___Black_rot.symptoms: Brown spots on leaves, rotting fruit with black mummies
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Remove infected plant parts, improve air circulation.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).description: A complex fungal disease causing leaf and fruit symptoms.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).symptoms: Interveinal striping, berry shatter, woody cankers
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).treatment: No effective cure, remove severely infected vines.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Avoid wound propagation, maintain vine health.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.description: A fungal disease causing angular brown lesions on leaves.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Remove infected debris, improve air flow.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).description: A bacterial disease spread by psyllid insects, fatal to citrus.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).symptoms: Blotchy mottled leaves, lopsided bitter fruit, leaf drop
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).treatment: No cure - remove infected trees, control psyllids.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).prevention: Use certified disease-free plants, control insect vectors.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.description: A bacterial disease causing angular lesions on leaves and fruit.
Peach___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, fruit spots, leaf drop
Peach___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation, remove infected debris.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.description: A bacterial disease causing water-soaked lesions.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves and fruit, defoliation

Potato___Early_blight.description: A fungal disease causing concentric ring lesions.
Potato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark spots with concentric rings, lower leaf death

Potato___Late_blight.description: A devastating fungal disease causing rapid plant death.
Potato___Late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, white mold, tuber rot
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Use certified seed, proper storage, resistant varieties.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.description: A fungal disease covering leaves with white powder.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.symptoms: White powdery coating on leaves, reduced yield

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.description: A fungal disease causing purple-brown leaf lesions.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.prevention: Use clean plants, avoid overhead irrigation.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.description: A bacterial disease causing dark spots on leaves and fruit.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Dark water-soaked spots, fruit lesions, defoliation

Tomato___Early_blight.description: A fungal disease causing concentric ring spots.
Tomato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark spots with target-like concentric rings, leaf drop
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Mulching, crop rotation, remove infected debris.

Tomato___Late_blight.description: A devastating water mold causing rapid plant death.
Tomato___Late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, white mold, plant collapse
Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: No cure - remove and destroy infected plants.
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.description: A fungal disease causing yellow spots and fuzzy growth.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.symptoms: Yellow spots, fuzzy olive-green growth on leaf undersides

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.description: A fungal disease causing many small dark spots.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small dark spots with light centers, leaf drop

Tomato___Spider_mites_(Two-spotted_spide.description: Tiny pests causing stippled, yellowing leaves.
Tomato___Spider_mites_(Two-spotted_spide.treatment: Insecticidal soap, neem oil, predatory mites.
Tomato___Spider_mites_(Two-spotted_spide.prevention: Maintain adequate moisture, avoid drought stress.

Tomato___Target_Spot.description: A fungal disease causing concentric ring lesions.
Tomato___Target_Spot.symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings, fruit rot
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Improve air circulation, avoid wet foliage.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.description: A viral disease spread by whiteflies, causing severe stunting.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.symptoms: Curled yellow leaves, stunted growth, no fruit
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: No cure - remove infected plants, control whiteflies.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties, control whitefly vectors.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: A viral disease causing mottled leaf patterns.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.symptoms: Mottled light and dark green leaves, distorted growth

Medium.action: Apply appropriate fungicides or treatments, improve cultural practices.

High.action: Immediate treatment required, remove severely infected parts.

Critical.action: No cure available - remove and destroy infected plants to prevent spread.
